title: Cape Krusenstern National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Anyone can be a Junior Ranger. Learning is the first step towards helping.  Complete the activities in the Junior Ranger book and mail the book to the park. Not only will you be able to tell others what you learned about the parks in northwest Alaska, but you can also earn the Junior Ranger badge, saber toothed cat patch, and even a water bottle.
